main.name: Rajath Anand
main.description: Actively looking for full time opportunities as a full-stack developer
main.bio: Hello! I'm Rajath, a passionate full-stack developer in Charlotte, NC. I enjoy building things that connect to the internet whether that be websites, applications or anything in between.

education.school: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
education.description: I got an opportunity to work on lot of projects using different technologies. The one which I like the most was the Medicine Management System (Technologies used: React, Spring boot, MySQL).

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description: Worked with a wonderful team of higly potential peers under an experienced CTO. I explored a lot of front end development, handling github version control, developing API's.

work.title: Programmer Analyst
work.description: Developed full-stack applications, interacted with clients, followed Agile methodology extensively, helped new joinees get comfortable with the work environment.
work.technologyUsed: Java, Spring boot, Informix Database, IBM Websphere, Load Balancing
